instruction: What is the name of the most notorious gangster of all time?
output: The most notorious gangster of all time is Al Capone, an American mobster who controlled the Chicago Outfit during the Prohibition Era in the early 1900s. He was notorious for his sophisticated and ruthless business tactics, as well as his famous quote, "I am like any other man. All I do is supply a demand". Capone was also involved in racketeering and bootlegging, and was eventually convicted for tax evasion.
